channel.title: [NPCs] Invisible NPCs
channel.description:
So, I played some Black Mesa today and found a rather strange bug. I was running along the corridor of the with the snow area, and out comes a houndeye. I jump and manage to jump on top of him. He turns invisible.
So I do some testing and apparently some npcs do turn invisible when the player jumps on them. They act normally, you just can't see them.
Tested so far: Invisible: * Houndeyes * Headcrabs * Sentry Ceiling Non-invisible: * All humans * Bullsquid * Grunt * Alien Slave
This guy had somewhat of the same issue. [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/13891-Random-invisible-models-enemies-npc/']Random invisible models (enemies/npc)[/url]
